subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Shockers made 10 of 20 3-point shots, advancing to the round of 16 with a resounding upset in a rare intrastate meeting.
snippet: The Shockers made 10 of 20 3-point shots, advancing to the round of 16 with a resounding upset in a rare intrastate meeting.
